channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [OGNL-23] String concatenation fails with ternary expressions
item.description:
This may be related to OGNL-22. The following expression works in OGNL 2.6 and evaluates to a class of "tabHeader":

<span jwcid="@Any" class="ognl:(true ? 'tabHeader' : '') + (false ? 'tabHeader' : '')">Test</span>

In 2.7 you get this error and stack trace:

Unable to parse OGNL expression '(true ? 'tabHeader' : '') + (false ? 'tabHeader' : '')': Error compiling expression on object $DirectorAccount_650@3c1[DirectorAccount] with expression node (true ? "tabHeader" : "") + (false ? "tabHeader" : "") getter body:

{ return ($w) (ognl.OgnlOps.booleanValue(true) ? "tabHeader" : "" + ognl.OgnlOps.booleanValue(false) ? "tabHeader" : "");}

setter body: null

  1. org.apache.hivemind.ApplicationRuntimeException: Unable to parse OGNL expression '(true ? 'tabHeader' : '') + (false ? 'tabHeader' : '')': Error compiling expression on object $DirectorAccount_650@3c1[DirectorAccount] with expression node (true ? "tabHeader" : "") + (false ? "tabHeader" : "") getter body: { return ($w) (ognl.OgnlOps.booleanValue(true) ? "tabHeader" : "" + ognl.OgnlOps.booleanValue(false) ? "tabHeader" : "");}

    setter body: null

item.environment: Tapestry 4.1.2 snapshot from 3-21, OGNL 2.7 snapshot from 3-25, Firefox 2, WinXP
item.summary: String concatenation fails with ternary expressions

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
